name: Daalder
text:
Daalder



As rouan molhi'ag ujil lursan en embier fut os Khosi'ag wah gher ot solsha Doldikam as hadishk ouapig ujil rokav, Adurith huirf tifur bimuhr daalder. En hulokam yifir

Molarath hij, as daalder nibiv, Turute'ag Sinvakam gufisha sincakam as lursan rouan, Lournath amel lourniif am kilivur, khesire, en khestis

Bahnith gher yi molarath solsha Os periug kol as rokav am as hadishk, turutath gher amel Lourgih Sinvath daalder doldith lo Lournath kol yi yifif errat

-Arnayth, urithir am abhoril kol Kilicithal
